name: football_match_historical_results
description: This dataset captures historical data of international soccer matches including match dates, teams, scores, tournament type, location, and neutrality of the venue.

fields.fieldDescription: Date on which the match was played
Number of goals scored by the home team
Number of goals scored by the away team
Name of the tournament in which the match was played
City where the match was held
Country where the match was held
Indicator if the venue was neutral (not home ground for either team)
